feed.title: ZaneOps Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • fix: metrics collection workflow failing when disk I/O is None by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/395

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • fix: log unhealthy error when the service is down, and allow infinite restarts by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/396
  • fix: redirect correctly when clicking deploy now by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/397

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.2...v1.6.3

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • fix: Occasional 502 Bad Gateway Error on server by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/398

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.3...v1.6.4

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • refactor: simplify proxy configuration for blue/green deployments by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/406

Misc changes

  • feat: show server limits on the settings page by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/404
  • chore: add link to docs in health check by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/407

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6
